Articles.Content:
If you want to cheat in a game, you should have to work for it.

Instant orbits are a workaround for not being able to assemble big things in orbit.

Edited to be less offensive. Sorry everybody.

*snip*

[mod]And you're not a Moderator. I suggest if you have issues, do what everyone else seems to be doing and properly report them to us so we can resolve them. Nova was stating his opinion and it had absolutely no flame material in it. Your post here and others? They do. Carry on.[/mod]
This is broken in .14 >. But another instant orbit thing came out so YAY

This has a good side and a bad side. The good side is if you want to practice 'docking' or get some screenshots or use a craft that you have already 'launched', this is perfect. The bad side is that many noobs will use this as a cheap way to get into orbit and not use rockets and stay noobs forever. Great part. ;D

That happend to me with MechJeb

Please don't bump old and dead threads.
